caption.title: Observed and predicted changes in F 95.
caption.p: Each solid line represents the observed F 95 for a specific three-year period, starting from 1982–1984 (black) and ending in 2010–2012 (blue). Gray lines show F 95 for intermediate three-year periods. The red dashed line represents the predicted temporal change in F 95 based on the observed spatial sensitivity to SWI 5 and observed long-term changes in SWI 5.
